articles.title: 'She should just die': Local actress Nurul Aini criticised by netizen; husband confronts him - AsiaOne

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Sri Lanka defaults on entire $51 billion external debt - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: Crisis-stricken Sri Lanka Tuesday announced it would default on its $51 billion external debt pending a bailout from the International Monetary Fund.
articles.content: Sri Lanka defaults on entire $51 billion external debt

articles.title: China's new artificial heart device gives hope to patients - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): What do a 58-year-old pig farm worker from Hubei province and Iron Man have in common? They both have futuristic "artificial heart" devices made of metal and magnets to keep them alive.

articles.description: The actress said there were “very long and deep scratches” on three panels of her car, and it had a punctured tyre, too.
